message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to purchase this amazing product. I think you'll really love it!
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! However, I was thinking more along the lines of $140. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $125. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I'm getting closer to your price, Bob! I can do $130, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $125 is too high. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $122?
I'm still willing to negotiate, Bob! I can meet you at $128, but that's my final offer. Take it or leave it!
